languages.text: "Осколки Предела были заточены в материальный предмет — оружие, испетое творцами сирот Принца. Меч стал оковами для частей Предела, тем самым лишив его всей полноты его сил — и став преградой на пути его возвращения. Тысячелетия миновали с тех пор. Творцы меча сгинули, а сам клинок, разбитый на осколки, исчез во тьме меж звезд, где их искали поколения моих слуг. До сего часа".

"The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon whose creation was sung by the artisans of the Prince's orphans. The sword shackled the fragments of the Edge, depriving them of their full power and blocking the path to their return. Millennia have passed since. The sword's creators are no more and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost to oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."
languages.original_text: "Осколки Предела были заточены в материальный предмет — оружие, испетое творцами сирот Принца. Меч стал оковами для частей Предела, тем самым лишив его всей полноты его сил — и став преградой на пути его возвращения. Тысячелетия миновали с тех пор. Творцы меча сгинули, а сам клинок, разбитый на осколки, исчез во тьме меж звезд, где их искали поколения моих слуг. До сего часа".

traits.locale_text: "Shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object, a weapon praised by the creators of the Prince's orphans. The sword became shackles for fragments of the Edge, took their full power away, and blocked the way to their return. Millenia passed since those times. Creators of the sword disappeared and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost in the dark among the stars where generations of my servants searched them. Until this hour."

Creators of the sword disappeared and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost in the dark among the stars where generations of my servants searched them. Until this hour."

The sword's creators disappeared and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost in oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."

languages.text: “破晓锋刃的碎片被封印在了一把剑之中，那把剑是王子遗孤的工匠师们传颂的武器。那把剑束缚了锋刃的碎片，剥夺了它全部的力量，阻断了它回归的道路。几千年过去了，那把剑的创造者已经消失了，而那把剑本身也变成了碎片，被遗忘在了群星之中。我的仆人们世世代代都在寻找它，而现在，终于找到了。”
languages.original_text: "The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon whose creation was sung by the artisans of the Prince's orphans. The sword shackled the fragments of the Edge, depriving them of their full power and blocking the path to their return. Millennia have passed since. The sword's creators are no more and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost to oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."

traits.locale_text: “破晓锋刃的碎片被封印在了一把剑之中，那把剑是王子遗孤的工匠师们传颂的武器。那把剑束缚了锋刃的碎片，剥夺了它全部的力量，阻断了它回归的道路。几千年过去了，那把剑的创造者已经消失了，而那把剑本身也变成了碎片，被遗忘在了群星之中。我的仆人们世世代代都在寻找它，而现在，终于找到了。”

languages.text: « Les fragments de la Lame furent scellés dans un objet, une arme plébiscitée par les artisans des orphelins du Prince. L'épée était comme une prison qui privait les fragments de leur pleine puissance et leur barrait le chemin du retour. Des millénaires passèrent. Les concepteurs de l'épée disparurent et cette dernière fut brisée en de multiples fragments disséminés parmi les étoiles. Des générations de mes serviteurs se sont succédé pour tenter de les retrouver. Jusqu'à aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon whose creation was sung by the artisans of the Prince's orphans. The sword shackled the fragments of the Edge, depriving them of their full power and blocking the path to their return. Millennia have passed since. The sword's creators are no more and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost to oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."

traits.locale_text: « Les fragments de la Lame furent scellés dans un objet, une arme plébiscitée par les artisans des orphelins du Prince. L'épée était comme une prison qui privait les fragments de leur pleine puissance et leur barrait le chemin du retour. Des millénaires passèrent. Les concepteurs de l'épée disparurent et cette dernière fut brisée en de multiples fragments disséminés parmi les étoiles. Des générations de mes serviteurs se sont succédé pour tenter de les retrouver. Jusqu'à aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: 「刃の欠片は物質体…皇子の遺児たちの創り手たちから称賛されし武器に封印された。剣は刃の破片の枷となり、その力を奪い復活への道を妨げた。それから数千年が過ぎ去った。創り手たちは消え去り、剣そのものは欠片に砕かれ、星々の忘却の彼方に失われた。そこで我らの下僕たちが今に至るまで、何世代のもわたる探索を続けているのだ」
languages.original_text: "The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon whose creation was sung by the artisans of the Prince's orphans. The sword shackled the fragments of the Edge, depriving them of their full power and blocking the path to their return. Millennia have passed since. The sword's creators are no more and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost to oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."

traits.locale_text: 「刃の欠片は物質体…皇子の遺児たちの創り手たちから称賛されし武器に封印された。剣は刃の破片の枷となり、その力を奪い復活への道を妨げた。それから数千年が過ぎ去った。創り手たちは消え去り、剣そのものは欠片に砕かれ、星々の忘却の彼方に失われた。そこで我らの下僕たちが今に至るまで、何世代のもわたる探索を続けているのだ」

languages.text: «Los fragmentos del Filo fueron sellados en un objeto material: un arma cuya creación fue entonada por los artesanos de los Huérfanos del Príncipe. La espada encadenó los fragmentos del Filo, privándolos de su poder completo y obstruyendo el camino de su regreso. De eso hace milenios. Los creadores de la espada ya no existen y la espada, hecha pedazos, se perdió entre las estrellas, donde generaciones enteras de mis sirvientes la han buscado. Hasta ahora».
languages.original_text: "The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon whose creation was sung by the artisans of the Prince's orphans. The sword shackled the fragments of the Edge, depriving them of their full power and blocking the path to their return. Millennia have passed since. The sword's creators are no more and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost to oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."

languages.text: "Die Splitter des Rands wurden in einem materiellen Gegenstand versiegelt — einer Waffe, die von den Schöpfern der Waisen des Prinzen gepriesen wurde. Das Schwert fesselte die Fragmente des Rands, beraubte sie ihrer vollen Macht und blockierte den Pfad zu ihrer Rückkehr. Jahrtausende sind vergangen. Die Schöpfer des Schwerts verschwanden und das Schwert selbst, in Splitter zerbrochen, ging zwischen den Sternen verloren, wo Generationen meiner Diener danach gesucht haben. Bis jetzt."
languages.original_text: "The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon praised by the creators of the Prince's Orphans. The sword shackled the fragments of the Edge, depriving them of their full power and blocking the path to their return. Millennia have passed. The sword's creators disappeared and the sword itself, broken into shards, was lost in oblivion among the stars, where generations of my servants have searched for it. Until now."

languages.text: "Yalım'ın parçaları, Prens'in demirci yetimlerinin yaratılışını müjdelediği bir silahın içine mühürlendi. Kılıç, Yalım'ın parçalarını zincirlerle sarıp tam güçlerinden mahrum bıraktı ve dönmelerini engelledi. Bu olay üzerinden binlerce yıl geçti. Kılıcı yapanlar artık yok, kılıç ise çok sayıda parçaya ayrılıp yıldızları arasında kayboldu. Hizmetkârlarım, nesillerdir onları arıyordu. Şimdiyse..."
languages.original_text: "The shards of the Edge were sealed in a material object — a weapon whose creation was sung by the artisans of the Prince's orphans.
